spec_data.Name: libpmemlog
spec_data.Description:
The libpmemlog library provides a pmem-resident log file. This is
useful for programs like databases that append frequently to a log
file.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:34:56 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Persistent Memory Resident Log File library
